# ui-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Overview

`ui-tooltip` is a component for rendering a tooltip that appears on hover.
It displays additional information when the user hovers over the component.

## Properties

| Property            | Attribute | Description                                                                                          | Type     | Default     |
| ------------------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `text` _(required)_ | `text`    | The text to display in the tooltip. This text will be shown when the user hovers over the component. | `string` | `undefined` |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
